div.h2: US Core Provenance Participant Type Extension Codes

div.p: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-provenance-participant-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: The entity that provided the copy to your system.
